name: Sacrificial Greatsword
description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Elemental Type as this character. (Once per Round)
(Only Claymore Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character uses an Elemental Skill:</color> Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Elemental Type as this character. (Once per Round)\n(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Only {SPRITE_PRESET#3203}Claymore Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)

storytext: This greatsword has seen the passage of many years, and was once owned by a clan of brave and gifted warriors who fought hard and died young.
